text: The Dalton Gang is a 1949 American Western film starring Don "Red" Barry and Julie Adams. It was directed by Ford Beebe. ==External links== * *The Dalton Gang at TCMDB Category:1949 films Category:American films Category:American Western (genre) films Category:English-language films Category:Films directed by Ford Beebe Category:Dalton Gang Category:1949 Western (genre) films Category:Lippert Pictures films Category:American black-and-white films
title: The Dalton Gang (film)
